title: What are the International Programs and Paths offered by the ISI-CNV Academy for Magnetism, Fascination, and Quantum Coaching?
first_phrase: This text presents an important cultural and research project that seeks to bridge ancient knowledge of magnetic hypnotism with modern quantum technologies. The brochure contains a complete system of exercises, encompassing both physical and mental aspects, that helps in rejuvenation and gives practitioners powerful tools for personal development. The techniques are not only centered on psychology but also relies on energy and nonverbal communication, and can be useful in therapy, relationships, social situations and more. The brochure is part of the Mesmerismus® formation, directed by Dr. Marco Paret, who updates the ancient knowledge to the quantum level.
content: When we began this project we were alone. Now we see how many people, mosto of them our students have gone on this path. These techniques are not only about psychology. They are also about energy (they are the western path of what in East is kundalini and similar techniques). They rely also on non verbal communication. Non verbal communication is very subtle, and the non verbal go deeper than the verbal They can be useful in therapy, in personal relationships and in every social situation. And also for health, habits, personal development and more… Most of books contain only a piece of this ancient and secret wisdom The complete system encompass a lot of exercises, both physical as mental. These exercises are rejuvenating and give energy to the practitioner. They help to have a powerful impact and expand the human potentialities And also be the first step of a Path to Presence that we could call “the ultimate path” We propose you these techniques in a practical formation called "Mesmerismus®". Even if the name contain the name "Mesmer", the techniques are more ancient as them of Mesmer. They encompass Fascination, Magnetism and non verbal techniques It is a secret school and dr. Paret, the director, bring this ancient knowledge in the present world… updating them to the most recent researches and to the quantum level They are very natural. They awake man to himself: there, in himself, he can find maximum power.
last_phrase: Explore the profound concepts for personal and professional growth through our innovative and comprehensive training programs. Our system is a convergence of ancient traditions and modern scientific paradigms, which can empower you to unleash your true potential. We offer several paths, including the Magnetic Path, Non-Verbal Communication and NLP3 Diploma, and Quantum Coaching Path, each designed to cater to different needs and interests. With the possibility of joining our growing organization and opening a branch in your country, the Mesmerismus® experience can transform you into a true master of presence, persuasion, and healing.
